title: Sophie Tufted Upholstered Platform Bed by iNSPIRE Q Classic

meta_data.author: Overstock™

og.title: Sophie Tufted Upholstered Platform Bed by iNSPIRE Q Classic - Overstock - 6281640
og.description: Give your bedroom an upgrade with this stylish upholstered Sophie Platform Bed from iNSPIRE Q Classic. The timeless tufted headboard and matching rails give this bed an understated glamour.
